mapper.select: SELECT breed_id, category_id, breed_name, origin, life_span, temperament, care_level, description, created_at, search_keywords FROM pet_breeds
SELECT breed_id, category_id, breed_name, origin, life_span, temperament, care_level, description, created_at, search_keywords FROM pet_breeds WHERE breed_id = #{breedId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet_breeds (category_id, breed_name, origin, life_span, temperament, care_level, description, created_at, search_keywords) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{breedName}, #{origin}, #{lifeSpan}, #{temperament}, #{careLevel}, #{description}, NOW(), #{searchKeywords})
mapper.update: UPDATE pet_breeds SET category_id = #{categoryId}, breed_name = #{breedName}, origin = #{origin}, life_span = #{lifeSpan}, temperament = #{temperament}, care_level = #{careLevel}, description = #{description}, search_keywords = #{searchKeywords} WHERE breed_id = #{breedId}
mapper.select: SELECT pb.breed_name as label, COUNT(p.pet_id) as value FROM pet_breeds pb LEFT JOIN pets p ON pb.breed_id = p.breed_id GROUP BY pb.breed_id, pb.breed_name ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT #{limit}
